options.text: If you want a collection (e. G. wikis) to be translated do the following. Add a field type "translations" which will create a new collection (e. G. wikis_translations). In this collection add the following boolean (default: true) fields: "be_source_for_translations", "let_be_translated" and "create_translations_for_all_languages". Ensure that Directus automatically created a collection "languages".
